title: SIG Wildcards
description: Playful but legit SIG translations. Short-answer; multiple acceptable phrasings.

easy.question: Latin → English: Ter capsula per os ter in die cum cibos
answer: Take three capsules by mouth three times daily with food
Take 3 capsules by mouth three times daily with food
Three capsules by mouth three times daily with food
hints: ter = three; capsula = capsule; per os = by mouth; ter in die = TID; cum cibos = with food/meals.
easy.solution: Take three capsules by mouth three times daily with food.

easy.question: Latin → English: Unum suppositorium quaque die pro re nata hora somni
answer: Insert one suppository once daily at bedtime as needed
Insert 1 suppository once daily at bedtime as needed
Insert one suppository at bedtime as needed once daily
hints: unum = one; suppositorium = suppository; quaque die = once daily; PRN = as needed; hora somni = at bedtime.
easy.solution: Insert one suppository once daily at bedtime as needed.

easy.question: English → Latin: Take 1 tablet by mouth twice daily as needed for pain
answer: i tab p.o. b.i.d. p.r.n. pain
i tablet p.o. b.i.d. p.r.n. pain
i tab per os b.i.d. p.r.n. pain
hints: i = one; tab = tablet; p.o. = per os; b.i.d. = twice daily; p.r.n. = as needed.
easy.solution: i tab p.o. b.i.d. p.r.n. pain.

easy.question: English → Latin: Instill 2 drops in each eye every 4 hours as needed
answer: gtt ii o.u. q4h p.r.n.
gtt ii in o.u. q4h p.r.n.
ii gtt o.u. q4h p.r.n.
hints: gtt = drops; ii = two; o.u. = each eye; q4h = every 4 hours; p.r.n. = as needed.

hard.question: Latin → English: due bis in die per os quater in die pro re nata nausea et vomitus
answer: Give two by mouth twice daily, up to four times daily as needed for nausea and vomiting
Give 2 by mouth twice daily up to four times daily as needed for nausea and vomiting
Take two by mouth twice daily, up to four times daily as needed for nausea and vomiting
hints: due = two; bis in die = twice daily; per os = by mouth; quater in die = four times daily; PRN N/V.
hard.solution: Give two by mouth twice daily, up to four times daily as needed for nausea and vomiting.

hard.question: English → Latin: Take 1 capsule by mouth every morning before breakfast
answer: i cap p.o. q.a.m. ac
i capsule p.o. q.a.m. ac
i cap per os q.a.m. ac
hints: q.a.m. = every morning; a.c. = before meals.

hard.question: English → Latin: Apply to affected area three times daily as needed for itching
answer: Apply to affected area t.i.d. p.r.n. itching
Apply to affected area t.i.d. p.r.n. pruritus
hints: t.i.d. = three times daily; p.r.n. = as needed; pruritus = itching.
hard.solution: Apply to affected area t.i.d. p.r.n. itching.

hard.question: Wildcard (fun): Drink two large coffees with friends every morning
answer: Bibere duo capulus magna cum amicis q.a.m.
Bibere duo capuli magni cum amicis q.a.m.
hints: Humorous practice; not a real prescription.
